introduction: I'm a Passionate Software Developer with several years experience. I've developed my interest for computers when I was 6 years old. I created my first website in 98/99 on my 9th grade and in 2003 started coding in VBA. In 2007 I started learning Java and after 2012 I dedicated most of my time to Android and Mobile Development. I also have interest and experience with BE systems in Java Spring, .Net and Flask.
